activities: Tecnitoys North America Inc. operates a toy distribution company which sells to distributors and retail dealers.  We also operate a website at www.scxworldwide.com which collects information about our dealers and end customers so that we can honor product warranties and keep interested customers aprised of new information about products and services.
address: c/o Charles Ehredt, 7144 N Harlem Suite 279
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovenia, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
recoursemech: Persons who raise complaints about Tecnitoys/SCXWorldWide handling of their private information are directed to a ¨contact us¨ form on our website which is monitored daily, with copies of such communications sent to the privacy manager.  Our website offers alternative contacts, including in senior management, who may receive copies of complaints if initial requests by an affected person go unanswered.  We will use the EU data protection authorities for dispute resolution.
